pacman
Class GhostPlayer

java.lang.Object
  pacman.GhostPlayer
Direct Known Subclasses:
BasicGhostPlayer, RandomGhostPlayer, StalkingGhostPlayer
public abstract class GhostPlayer
extends Object

An abstract class for class that can choose a ghost's moves in the Pac-Man game.
